//  Java program to find areaa of preimeter of rectangle
public class Q11_A_Java_Ass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int length= 4;
		int breadth = 8;
		int perimeter , area;
		
		area=length*breadth;
		perimeter=2*length+breadth;
		
		System.out.println("Area of rectangle woithout using mthod:"+area);
		System.out.println("Perimeter of rectangle without using method :" +perimeter);
		
	}

}


Output:-
Area of rectangle woithout using mthod:32
Perimeter of rectangle without using method :16
